'''Beta 1.2.13.11''' is the fifth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.13]], released on March 20, 2018,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004165151-Minecraft-Beta-1-2-13-11-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.2.13.11 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=March 20, 2018}}</ref> which adds an option to swap {{keys|A}}/{{keys|B}} and {{keys|X}}/{{keys|Y}} buttons on controllers and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Added two options to swap {{keys|A}}/{{keys|B}} and {{keys|X}}/{{keys|Y}} buttons on controllers, which can be found in Controller Settings.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the cause of several crashes.
* When Experimental Gameplay is enabled, tridents can now be enchanted.
* Mobs will once again not spawn on transparent blocks like glass and fences.
* Top snow falling on a top snow block no longer loses one layer.
* Ladders can once again be placed in the same block occupied by a player.</onlyinclude>
